price: 8. To, babwakela ye bomengo, to azala na bilanga mpo aliaka na yango. Mpe babubi balobi: Oyo bozali kolanda azali ya kolokama.
arabic: أَوۡ يُلۡقَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِ كَنزٌ أَوۡ تَكُونُ لَهُۥ جَنَّةٞ يَأۡكُلُ مِنۡهَاۚ وَقَالَ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ إِن تَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا رَجُلٗا مَّسۡحُورًا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: aw yul'qā ilayhi kanzun aw takūnu lahu jannatun yakulu min'hā waqāla al-ẓālimūna in tattabiʿūna illā rajulan masḥūran
